name: Republic of China
startIntroPart1: Dr. Sun, the revolution has succeeded.
startIntroPart2: The Three Principles of the People must now guide us to prosperity.
declaringWar: The revolution faces threats. We must defend the Republic!
attacked: You dare attack the free Republic?
introduction: I am Sun Yat-sen, provisional president of the Republic of China.
uniqueObjects: 20% Great Person generation in Golden Ages
